description: T1 & T2 - Liquid-amber - Reduce height 1-1.5m below most recent previous reduction points and reduce sides to contain and shape. Final height of 9m and final spread 4m.G3 - Silver Birch x4  - Reduce height 1-1.5m to most recent previous reduction points and reduce sides to contain and shape. Final height of 10m and spread of 4m.T4 - Silver Maple - Reduce height 1-1.5m below most recent previous reduction points and reduce sides to contain and shape. Final height of 14m and final spread 8m.T5 - Cherry - Reduce height by 0.5-1m below most recent previous reduction points and reduce sides to contain and shape. Final height of 6m and final spread 4m.T6 - Silver Birch - Reduce height by 1-1.5m to most recent previous reduction points and reduce sides to contain and tidy. Final height of 10m and final spread 4m
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T5
Works agreed to tree labelled T6
Works agreed to tree labelled T4
Works agreed to tree labelled T1
Works agreed to tree labelled T2
Works agreed to tree GROUP labelled G3
